About

Briefly about Me

Web development enthusiast

More than a year ago, I started learning the basics of web design (HTML/CSS/Bootstrap). Since I had a great desire to become a web developer, I mastered the basics successfully and well, of course with a lot of practice and research. Since I opted for the frontend, the logical continuation of the story was JavaScript. After a few months of independent study, I enrolled in a course that helped me understand JavaScript and its use more clearly. As the most important part of the education, I would single out the IT Bootcamp, which I successfully completed and earned the title of WordPress Expert.
